task.title: Audio Mixers
task.shortdesc: The audio mixers allows an agent to set the audio input/output for a screen recording.

taskbody.context: This section covers the audio mixers controls.

step.cmd: Toggle the bars in the Audio Mixers tab to set and check audio input/output for the Browser, Desktop Audio, Mic/Aux, and Video Capture.
Click the three vertical ellipses and settings icon for more audio controls, as applicable.
Also, refer to the audio input/output capture details in the link: https://obsproject.com/kb/audio-sources
